data.comment: The match is underway in Tondela.
Joao Pedro's header is off-target for Tondela.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Santa Clara are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 7, In Tondela, Fabio Cardoso (Santa Clara) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Lincoln (Santa Clara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Santa Clara's Thiago Santana is whistled for offside at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Santa Clara's Thiago Santana is on target but unsuccessful.
Joao Bento awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
In the minute 13, Joao Bento signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Tondela's half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In Tondela Santa Clara attack through Nene. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Nene (Santa Clara) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In Tondela, Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 19, Santa Clara's Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 20, Pedro Augusto (Tondela) has received a yellow card from Joao Bento.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 21, Tondela have a goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
Free kick Santa Clara.
In the minute 23, In Tondela Santa Clara drive forward through Nene. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Tondela.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 26, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tondela pushes forward through Salvador Agra, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Tondela's Jhon Murillo has been booked in Tondela.
In the minute 30, Santa Clara are coming forward and Nene gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Joao Bento awards Tondela a goal kick.
Free kick Tondela.
In the minute 32, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Salvador Agra.
That's a fine assist from Abdel Jalil.
In the minute 37, In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Joao Bento signals a throw-in for Santa Clara, close to Tondela's area.
In Tondela Santa Clara's Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis is caught offside.
In the minute 39, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Mario Gonzalez (Tondela) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rafael Ramos (Santa Clara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela just outside Santa Clara's area.
Tondela push forward at Estadio Joao Cardoso and Salvador Agra gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santa Clara defence.
The first-half is over at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
The home team have replaced Abdel Jalil with Mohamed Naoufel Khacef. This is the first substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
In the minute 47, Joao Pedro for Tondela gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Joao Bento signals a Tondela throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Santa Clara.
Santa Clara's Osama Rashid breaks free at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
In the minute 59, Joao Afonso (Santa Clara) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Tondela.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 61, Joao Bento signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Tondela's half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 62, Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Salomao is replacing Ukra for Santa Clara at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Santa Clara drives forward and Thiago Santana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Tondela needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Tondela.
Mario Gonzalez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tondela.
In the minute 65, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
In the minute 67, Goal! Mario Gonzalez extends Tondela's lead to 2-0.
Jhon Murillo instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Santa Clara.
In the minute 70, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Lincoln (Santa Clara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 74, Tondela have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Tondela's Salvador Agra misses with an attempt on goal.
Joao Bento awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Daniel Ramos is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Costinha replacing Mansur.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 76, Pako Ayestaran (Tondela) is making a second substitution, with Tomislav Strkalj replacing Mario Gonzalez.
Free kick in a good position for Santa Clara!
The home team have replaced Salvador Agra with Tiago. This is the third substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
In the minute 79, Santa Clara drive upfield and Osama Rashid gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Tomislav Strkalj of Tondela smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 81, Rafael Barbosa for the home team is judged to be offside.
Joao Bento blows against Santa Clara's Thiago Santana for offside.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a third substitution, with Anderson Carvalho replacing Osama Rashid.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Tondela.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Julio Rodrigues Romao replacing Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis.
In the minute 85, Pierre Sagna is replacing Rafael Ramos for Santa Clara at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 86, In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fabio Cardoso is booked for the away team.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Santa Clara's Costinha is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Bento will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Rafael Barbosa of Tondela gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
Joao Bento signals a Tondela throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
The home team have replaced Pedro Augusto with Jaume Grau. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Pako Ayestaran is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Jota replacing Rafael Barbosa.
